2017 Season Highlights:

9/1 vs Wisconsin-Platteville: Played a full 90 minutes in his first game as a defender in the team's 1-0 win

9/2 vs St. Joseph's-Brooklyn: Part of the defensive unit that didn't allow a shot on goal in the team's 1-0 victory

2015 Highlights: (09/04 vs John Jay): Took part of the double assist with Davauni Brown to have Tyler Krychkowski from a one timer.

2014 Highlights (8/30 vs Trine): Had three of his four shots on net.

Personal: Luis Cruz...Born June 21, 1996 in Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico...Parents are Genoveva and Luis Cruz… Has four siblings…Kicks right-footed...Majoring in Biology...

High School: A June 19, 2015 graduate of West Windsor Plainsboro High School South in West Windsor, NJ
